definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Current liabilities as "0", the quick ratio is how much?
sentences.chinese: 流动负债为“0”时，速动比率为多少？

sentences.english: They now outnumber humans in New Zealand by a ratio of 12 to 1.
sentences.chinese: 现在新西兰的绵羊和居民的数目比率是12比1。

sentences.english: Measures the rate at which the company acquires new customers in a given time period.
sentences.chinese: 衡量在一定时间内从期初存货中售出的产品比率。

sentences.english: It is totally unfair but all my incomes are taxable at the top rate.
sentences.chinese: 我所有收入都要按最高比率纳税，这太不公平了。

sentences.english: Reduce the PR in Mid-levels West.
sentences.chinese: 降低半山区西部的地积比率。

sentences.english: The ratio of the stillbirth and the early neonatal death de creased one stage by one stage. Conclus…
sentences.chinese: 各阶段死产和早期新生儿死亡比率呈逐阶段性下降。

sentences.english: MARGIE PEDEN Africa, unfortunately, has the highest rate of all these accidental injuries, unintentional injuries.
sentences.chinese: 很不幸，非洲所有儿童无心伤害比率最高。

sentences.english: Have a regulatory capital adequacy ratio of 200 percent or higher for the half-year period immediately prior to the date of application.
sentences.chinese: 申请日前半年自有资本适足比率应达百分之二百以上。

sentences.english: It's 57: 40, so this measure has failed.
sentences.chinese: 投票比率是57:40，所以该措施没有获得通过。

sentences.english: Mourinho's win-lose ratio is vastly superior to that of Benitez.
sentences.chinese: 穆里尼奥的胜负场次比率要远远高于贝尼特斯。

sentences.english: We want to shift the pendulum slightly.
sentences.chinese: 我们想稍微改变这个比率。

sentences.english: Do the ratios evolve with the project maturity?
sentences.chinese: 这个比率跟项目的成熟度有关么？

sentences.english: Generally believed that production-based company a reasonable minimum liquidity ratio is 2.
sentences.chinese: 一般认为，生产型公司合理的最低流动比率是2。

sentences.english: We couldn’t agree to that, but we could change the rates.
sentences.chinese: 我们不同意那一点，但是我们可以修改一下比率。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the antibiotic resistant phenotyping of Acinetobacter spp on NC21 panel.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究不动杆菌属在NC21板上耐药表型及比率。

sentences.english: A price-to-rent ratio of more than 20 suggests that renting may be a better deal.
sentences.chinese: 比率大于20表明租房可能是。

definition: to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
